itunes:title: Larry Chen (Automotive/motorsports photographer)
itunes:author: Matt Farah & Zack Klapman
itunes:summary:
Pikes Peak, the new Nissan Proto, smogging an R32 Sklyine, chasing Baja trucks; Larry Chen has captured it all. He is one of the best automotive photographers in the business. Larry travels the world capturing incredible moments in motorsport, hosts a show for Hoonigan, and partnered with Canon to teach photography classes. He's photographed driving stars and secret cars. Oh, and his chase car is a sweet Datsun 240Z. 

@larry_chen_foto
Buy sick prints here https://www.etsy.com/shop/LarryChenPhoto
https://www.larrychenphoto.com/
